title: How to Activate an O2 Pay As You Go Sim

steps.headline: Insert your sim into your phone.
If you have a new top up card, call 248 and follow instructions to link.
If you haven't, head to o2.co.uk/webtopup
Top up online or go to a topup point.
Call 4444.
steps.description: Check your balance and hangup. Your first call or text verifies your call for incoming calls and texts.

tyn: Internet Access (required if no topup card)
Topup card (required if no internet access)
text: Insert your sim into your phone.  If you have a new top up card, call 248 and follow instructions to link.  If you haven't, head to o2.co.uk/webtopup  Top up online or go to a topup point. Topup £10 or more. Call 4444. Check your balance and hangup. Your first call or text verifies your call for incoming calls and texts. Your sim is now activated.
